sources.title: North of the Border (1946) RUSSELL HAYDENüçï COWBOY WESTERN
sources.description:
Stars: Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Douglas Fowley
Director: B. Reeves Eason

Get ready for action, suspense, and classic Western justice in this 1946 frontier thriller starring Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, and Douglas Fowley. Directed by veteran filmmaker B. Reeves Eason, this gripping tale takes viewers beyond the U.S. frontier and deep into the wilds of Canada, where betrayal and murder ride alongside honor and loyalty.

When an American rancher is falsely accused of murdering his business partner north of the border, he must go on the run and track down the real killer to clear his name. Packed with tense confrontations, dramatic twists, and rugged landscapes, this Classic Western delivers everything fans love‚Äîjustice on horseback, outlaws, and a hero who won‚Äôt back down.

Presented by PizzaFLIX, this vintage gem is a must-watch for fans of Cowboy Westerns, 1940s Westerns, and Russell Hayden films. With strong performances from Inez Cooper and Douglas Fowley, and tight direction from B. Reeves Eason, it‚Äôs a forgotten treasure from Hollywood‚Äôs golden era.

metadata.Plot: Rancher "Utah" Neyes crosses the border into Canada to meet his partner, only to find that the latter has been murdered by a gang led by "Nails" Nelson. "Utah", with the aid of RCMP Jack Craig and fur-trapper Ivy Jenkins, manages to clear his own name of suspicion and also break up Nelson's fur-stealing and smuggling racket.
metadata.Writer: James Oliver Curwood, Arthur V. Jones
metadata.Actors: Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Douglas Fowley
